Getting started¶

Installing ParticleSpy¶

Install HyperSpy¶

In order to use ParticleSpy you need to have a python environment with Hyperspy installed. Full instructions for Hyperpsy installation can be found at http://hyperspy.org/hyperspy-doc/v1.3/user_guide/install.html.

Install ParticleSpy¶

You currently need to install from the git repository using git. If you have git installed you can use the following command to install the package.

pip install -e git+https://github.com/ePSIC-DLS/ParticleSpy

Hopefully this works!

ParticleSpy
